name: Fastforward-Start-2
title: Skip first hour
author: Aidan647
description:
I don't bother hand mining/crafting first hour 

 Increased starting equipment to remove hand mining stage of game and jump straight into using trains 

 Hopefully enough items to get a small factory and power station running. 

 Doesn't effect research, you will still need to do all of that.

Last update by ZwerOxotnik
